channel.title: What do you like about RuneScape / What did you like about RuneScape?
channel.description:
[center]What did you like about RuneScape before EOC, it can be from far back as classic or it can be up to Pre-EOC, but post below what you liked about RuneScape the most before EOC, or still like about it!
What I loved about RuneScape back in 2006-2009 was the eco and community. Mostly everyone was friendly and jagex aswell as the players didn't care about only money but cared about the players and the community. [/center]

item.title: What do you like about RuneScape / What did you like about RuneScape?
item.dc:creator: @Rodgerwilco Rodgerwilco
item.description:
@Rodgerwilco wrote:

[quote=“Classic, post:7, topic:483144”]I don’t like when people said the community was great back in 06, and everything was amazing. First off, everyone was like 9 when they played in 2006, so obviously you’re going to remember some nice people because everyone was a kid.

Second off, RuneScape isn’t about money, the thing is they’re struggling as a company. Hard. They need to pay the devs to produce new content for you guys, so they had to make these micro transactions, the content isn’t half bad either. I bet atleast 80% of people who say they hate the EoC hasn’t tried it. They’ve recently created drygore weapons, working on the new grandmaster quest, reworked a lot of places such as al kharid, the wizards tower, and made the kalphite king, and the PoP.

Get your head out of the clouds, 2006 is just nostalgia.

Anyyywayy, I really enjoy the questing and the aspect that you can have so many skills to train on runescape

Edit: any spelling errors, sry on my phone[/quote]

Has it ever occured to you that we enjoy simplicity? If we wanted wow, we would play wow.
Runescape thrived on simplicity for the longest time and now with the radical change it’s just far too much.

Read full topic
item.source: What do you like about RuneScape / What did you like about RuneScape?

item.title: What do you like about RuneScape / What did you like about RuneScape?
item.dc:creator: @south-park south-park
item.description:
@south-park wrote:

[quote=“drubrkletern, post:21, topic:483144”][quote author=Acorn_ link=topic=601379.msg4223931#msg4223931 date=1360913196]

I don’t like when people said the community was great back in 06, and everything was amazing. First off, everyone was like 9 when they played in 2006, so obviously you’re going to remember some nice people because everyone was a kid.

This logic is loveing retarded

Uhm, are you just going to bash what I say or are you going to actualy give a reason of why my logic is retarded, because you’re embarassing yourself :s

Let me explain why your logic is as flawed as always.
Just because you were 9 years old in the year 2006, does not mean you may categorize a whole community as that age simply based on the fact that they were nicer. The truth is the general population of the game during this time were ages 14 - 22. This is backed up by a database chart of registered ages provided by a popular runescape community website.

The truth is, the community was a better community 7 years ago than it was today. Why? The internet has poisoned the brains of people like you and created hate filled trolls who put others down to make themselves feel better.
This was not the case back then due to its young age of approximately 10 years give or take.
[/quote]
roflmao u scrub bro? get turm zerk clawed to d spec maul ovl korasi torva nex scumguystev’d lmao rofl L nice 2 gp bank boted st4ts il fk u up irl nerd faggot wow l2pkprodkorasiownagemontage420mlg[/quote]
this is what acorn was talking about…

Read full topic

Just because you were 9 years old in the year 2006, does not mean you may categorize a whole community as that age simply based on the fact that they were nicer. The truth is the general population of the game during this time were ages 14 - 22. This is backed up by a database chart of registered ages provided by a popular runescape community website.

The truth is, the community was a better community 7 years ago than it was today. Why? The internet has poisoned the brains of people like you and created hate filled trolls who put others down to make themselves feel better.
This was not the case back then due to its young age of approximately 10 years give or take.[/quote]

item.source: What do you like about RuneScape / What did you like about RuneScape?

item.title: What do you like about RuneScape / What did you like about RuneScape?
item.dc:creator: @Andrew_Ferguson The317Guy
item.description:
@Andrew_Ferguson wrote:

I miss back when there was a sense of community, back when to sell items you had to stand in varrock west and merch them. Back when being a lobster fisher was profitable and people make their living off of doing such. Back when a mercher wasn’t just a dick with 20b buying out all of an item so he can sell it back for 40b and ruin the games eco in one day. Back when you couldn’t stand in an area and make money money hosting gambles in an hour than you could playing the game for a year. Back when skills were hard to be buyable and you looked up to people that really put hard work into the game. Back when there were clans that cared about each other and hosted events. Back when your RS friends would come hang out with you and train rather than power level and not talk for 6 hours. Back when people wanted to play the game, not just had too.

Read full topic

item.description:

[quote=“Classic, post:18, topic:483144”][quote author=Acorn_ link=topic=601379.msg4220925#msg4220925 date=1360736678]

I don’t like when people said the community was great back in 06, and everything was amazing. First off, everyone was like 9 when they played in 2006, so obviously you’re going to remember some nice people because everyone was a kid.

This logic is loveing retarded
[/quote]
Uhm, are you just going to bash what I say or are you going to actualy give a reason of why my logic is retarded, because you’re embarassing yourself :s[/quote]
Let me explain why your logic is as flawed as always.
Just because you were 9 years old in the year 2006, does not mean you may categorize a whole community as that age simply based on the fact that they were nicer. The truth is the general population of the game during this time were ages 14 - 22. This is backed up by a database chart of registered ages provided by a popular runescape community website.

The truth is, the community was a better community 7 years ago than it was today. Why? The internet has poisoned the brains of people like you and created hate filled trolls who put others down to make themselves feel better.
This was not the case back then due to its young age of approximately 10 years give or take.

item.title: What do you like about RuneScape / What did you like about RuneScape?
item.dc:creator: @Elrick Elrick
item.description:
@Elrick wrote:

[quote=“Tutorial, post:12, topic:483144”][quote author=south-park link=topic=601379.msg4220360#msg4220360 date=1360705024]
And that it’s to much like WoW now.
[/quote]
This has got to be the most ignorant remark about modern MMORPGs these days… Have you seen any other game besides RuneScape and World of Warcraft? If not, they all have some type of ‘ability’ system. That is the only similarity between most games.[/quote]
Action bar, MASSIVE amounts of hp and damage, and abilities are all very much WoW oriented. Runescape had no ability system, which is why it was original. Jagex stripped RS of all originality and made it just like every other MMORPG. Thanks for proving our point.

Read full topic

item.title: What do you like about RuneScape / What did you like about RuneScape?
item.dc:creator: @runescape_sucks runescape sucks
item.description:
@runescape_sucks wrote:

Elrick:

I used to make friends easily, but now it’s just filled with trolls.

This is the internet’s fault, not runescape’s.

I’ve tried EoC multiple times, on new and old accounts, and I just don’t want it. Nothing wrong with the rest of the game, but then again, I never liked combat anyway.

Read full topic
item.source: What do you like about RuneScape / What did you like about RuneScape?

item.title: What do you like about RuneScape / What did you like about RuneScape?
item.dc:creator: @Elrick Elrick
item.description:
@Elrick wrote:

I liked the old community. I used to make friends easily, but now it’s just filled with trolls. I do love the idea of skilling and not having a game that focuses purely on killing and destroying both other players and monsters. Plugins for Minecraft such as MCMMO kind of give me that nostalgic leveling up my skills feeling.

Read full topic
item.source: What do you like about RuneScape / What did you like about RuneScape?

item.title: What do you like about RuneScape / What did you like about RuneScape?
item.dc:creator: @classic mopmans little slave
item.description:
@classic wrote:

I don’t like when people said the community was great back in 06, and everything was amazing. First off, everyone was like 9 when they played in 2006, so obviously you’re going to remember some nice people because everyone was a kid.

Second off, RuneScape isn’t about money, the thing is they’re struggling as a company. Hard. They need to pay the devs to produce new content for you guys, so they had to make these micro transactions, the content isn’t half bad either. I bet atleast 80% of people who say they hate the EoC hasn’t tried it. They’ve recently created drygore weapons, working on the new grandmaster quest, reworked a lot of places such as al kharid, the wizards tower, and made the kalphite king, and the PoP.

Get your head out of the clouds, 2006 is just nostalgia.

Anyyywayy, I really enjoy the questing and the aspect that you can have so many skills to train on runescape

Edit: any spelling errors, sry on my phone

Read full topic
item.source: What do you like about RuneScape / What did you like about RuneScape?

item.title: What do you like about RuneScape / What did you like about RuneScape?
item.dc:creator: @Mitko Mitko
item.description:
@Mitko wrote:

Every single thing until gambling became big in the game as mentioned above. I miss the good old monster killing -> drop selling.

Huge majority of people haven’t put any effort into their expensive equipment nowadays.

“How did you get 99 herb bro?”

  • “I won a 600m stake.”
    …

Read full topic
item.source: What do you like about RuneScape / What did you like about RuneScape?
